itemDescription: U.S. Navy sailor of the American Civil War, recipient of the Medal of Honor

wikipedia_page.main: John Griffiths (born 1835) was a sailor in the U.S. Navy during the American Civil War. He received the Medal of Honor for his actions during the Second Battle of Fort Fisher on January 15, 1865.

response: * John Griffiths, Captain of the Forecastle, U.S. Navy
